data.text: @Mike_Honey_ @BigBadDenis If only we’d bothered to test and sequence properly we’d actually have data. Apparently not knowing what’s happening is better 🤦🏻‍♀️

@BigBadDenis Seems a weird and ambiguous statement about actual BA.2 prevalence. You could read that as “there’s more BA.2 than detected by sampling” or the opposite?

FWIW, here’s the data shared via GISAID: https://t.co/ehqrsHAIir
@BigBadDenis As if NSW Health gives a shit. I’m surprised they’re making any announcements at all 🙄
@BigBadDenis Viruses need no visa to enter Australia these days, all welcome #LetitRip
@BigBadDenis As per the recent data from Hong Kong, BA.2 is more severe for children?

@BigBadDenis So effectively Omicron has overtaken Delta, and the few samples taken and genetically sequenced suggest BA.2 is more prevalent than BA.1. Already seen in Denmark in December. They admit to sequencing small numbers, so have no definite idea, nor if any new variant is present. 🤦🏼‍♀️
@BigBadDenis Well great, now we’ve got BA.2 circulating.
